languages.text: {n}Сервитор неподвижно стоит на коленях, не подавая признаков жизни. Вместо глаз у женщины теперь обугленные дыры — кажется какой-то сбой поджарил ее мозг изнутри. На ее губах застыла умиротворенная улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервитор неподвижно стоит на коленях, не подавая признаков жизни. Вместо глаз у женщины теперь обугленные дыры — кажется какой-то сбой поджарил ее мозг изнутри. На ее губах застыла умиротворенная улыбка.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор неподвижно стоит на коленях, не подавая признаков жизни. Вместо глаз у женщины теперь обугленные дыры — кажется какой-то сбой поджарил ее мозг изнутри. На ее губах застыла умиротворенная улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is standing on its knees, motionless and showing no signs of life. Two charred holes have replaced its eyes — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

{n}The servitor that was once a woman is standing on its knees, motionless and showing no signs of life. Two charred holes have replaced its eyes — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

{n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

{n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

{n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}かつて女性であったそのサーヴィターは跪いて動きを止める。そこに生命の痕跡はない。かつて目があった箇所には、ふたつの焦げた穴が開いていた…おそらくは、何かの故障によって内部より焼かれてしまったのだろう。その顔には、穏やかな笑顔が浮かんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}かつて女性であったそのサーヴィターは跪いて動きを止める。そこに生命の痕跡はない。かつて目があった箇所には、ふたつの焦げた穴が開いていた…おそらくは、何かの故障によって内部より焼かれてしまったのだろう。その顔には、穏やかな笑顔が浮かんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个由某个女人改造成的机仆跪在地上，一动不动，没有任何生命迹象。原本是眼睛的位置，出现了两个烧焦的洞。看起来，它的机械装置发生了某种故障，烧坏了它的大脑。此时此刻，它的脸上挂着安详的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个由某个女人改造成的奴工跪在地上，一动不动，没有任何生命迹象。原本是眼睛的位置，出现了两个烧焦的洞。看起来，它的机械装置发生了某种故障，烧坏了它的大脑。此时此刻，它的脸上挂着安详的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor qui était auparavant une femme est à genoux, immobile. Elle ne montre aucun signe de vie. Deux trous carbonisés se trouvent à la place de ses yeux. Un dysfonctionnement a dû brûler son cerveau de l'intérieur. Un sourire paisible est figé sur son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor qui était auparavant une femme est à genoux, immobile. Elle ne montre aucun signe de vie. Deux trous carbonisés se trouvent à la place de ses yeux. Un dysfonctionnement a dû brûler son cerveau de l'intérieur. Un sourire paisible est figé sur son visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El servidor que en su día fue una mujer está arrodillado, inmóvil y no da señales de vida. Hay dos agujeros calcinados donde en su momento tenía los ojos. Algún fallo le habrá quemado el cerebro por dentro. Tiene una sonrisa tranquila en la cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor que en su día fue una mujer está arrodillado, inmóvil y no da señales de vida. Hay dos agujeros calcinados donde en su momento tenía los ojos. Algún fallo le habrá quemado el cerebro por dentro. Tiene una sonrisa tranquila en la cara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor, der einst eine Frau war, kniet bewegungslos und ohne ein Zeichen von Leben am Boden. Wo einst die Augen waren, klaffen zwei verkohlte Löcher ... einige Fehlfunktionen müssen das Gehirn von innen verbrannt haben. Das Gesicht ist zu einem schmerzvollen Lächeln verzogen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor, der einst eine Frau war, kniet bewegungslos und ohne ein Zeichen von Leben am Boden. Wo einst die Augen waren, klaffen zwei verkohlte Löcher ... einige Fehlfunktionen müssen das Gehirn von innen verbrannt haben. Das Gesicht ist zu einem schmerzvollen Lächeln verzogen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eskiden kadın olan hizmetör, dizleri üstüne çökmüş hâlde hareketsiz duruyor ve hiç yaşam belirtisi göstermiyor. Bir zamanlar gözlerinin olduğu yerde artık kömürleşmiş iki delik var. Bir arıza yüzünden beyni içeriden yanmış olmalı. Yüzünde huzurlu bir gülümseme var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor that was once a woman is kneeling, motionless, and showing no signs of life. There are two charred holes where the eyes once were — some malfunction must have burned its brain from the inside. Its face bears a peaceful smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eskiden bir kadın olan servitör, dizlerinin üzerine çökmüş bir biçimde hareketsiz duruyor ve hiç yaşam belirtisi göstermiyor. Bir zamanlar gözlerinin olduğu yerde, şimdi alazlanmış iki delik var. Bir arıza yüzünden beyni içeriden yanmış olmalı. Yüzünde huzurlu bir gülümseme var.{/n}
